description: This file defines APIs for managing and interacting with the InterfaceStack object within the COSA Data Model Library. It primarily contains function declarations for retrieving, updating, and querying interface stack entries and their parameters.
external_methods: ANSC_HANDLE InterfaceStack_GetEntry(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext, ULONG nIndex, ULONG* pInsNumber)
BOOL InterfaceStack_GetParamBoolValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext, char* ParamName, BOOL* pBool)
BOOL InterfaceStack_GetParamIntValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext, char* ParamName, int* pInt)
BOOL InterfaceStack_GetParamUlongValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext, char* ParamName, ULONG* pUlong)
ULONG InterfaceStack_GetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext, char* ParamName, char* pValue, ULONG* pUlSize)

methods.name: InterfaceStack_GetEntryCount
methods.description: Retrieves the total number of interface stack entries.

methods.name: InterfaceStack_GetEntry
methods.description: Fetches a specific interface stack entry by index.

methods.name: InterfaceStack_IsUpdated
methods.description: Checks whether the interface stack has been updated since the last check.

methods.name: InterfaceStack_Synchronize
methods.description: Synchronizes the interface stack data with the current system state.

methods.name: InterfaceStack_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value for a specific interface stack entry.

methods.name: InterfaceStack_GetParamIntValue
methods.description: Retrieves an integer parameter value for a specific interface stack entry.

methods.name: InterfaceStack_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves an unsigned long parameter value for a specific interface stack entry.

methods.name: InterfaceStack_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value for a specific interface stack entry.
